data.title: Discovery Song Camp with Kenny 'Babyface' Edmonds
data.meta_description: Good Vibes Music Group presents the Discovery Song Camp with Kenny 'Babyface' Edmonds hosted by Spotify Secret Genius Studios in Los Angeles, Atlanta, Nashville, and London. Undiscovered and unpublished songwriters and producers are invited to apply for a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to be mentored by prolific hit-maker and multiplatinum recording artist, Babyface.
data.meta_site_name: Discovery Song Camp with Kenny 'Babyface' Edmonds
data.text:
Babyface has enlisted numerous elite Guest Mentors to join him in each city! Dominating various musical genres and hailing from diverse areas of expertise, these Guest Mentors will join you and Babyface in the Secret Genius Studios to share their personal experiences with you and give you exclusive guidance as you break in to the industry.

Kenneth 'Babyface' Edmonds

Kenny 'Babyface' Edmonds' award-winning, multi-faceted urban/pop career included three consecutive multi-platinum landmark albums. As co-founder of LaFace Records with L.A. Reid in 1989, Babyface nurtured the careers of such megastars as TLC, OutKast, Usher, and Toni Braxton. An 11-time Grammy Award winner, Babyface's achievements include extensive songwriting and production credits from the 1990's to present-day hits. He has produced and written/co-written hits for artists from Whitney Houston, Eric Clapton, and Michael Jackson – to Boyz II Men, Mariah Carey, Beyoncé, Bruno Mars, Ty Dolla $ign, and Ariana Grande – among countless others.

Spotify Playlist Penned by Babyface
